articles.title: How to come up with a down payment in the Boston area: ‘Things have never cost more’
articles.description:
Experts offer advice for first-time home buyers in Massachusetts.

The post How to come up with a down payment in the Boston area: ‘Things have never cost more’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Experts advise Boston first-time home buyers on down payment strategies amid rising costs.
Massachusetts home prices have surged, making down payments more challenging for buyers.
Increased housing costs could delay homeownership for many Boston residents.

articles.title: Nikola Jokić has 30 points and 12 rebounds in the Nuggets’ 103-84 win over the Celtics
articles.description:
Jaylen Brown had 23 points for the Celtics, who finished 3-1 on a Western Conference trip.

The post Nikola Jokić has 30 points and 12 rebounds in the Nuggets’ 103-84 win over the Celtics appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jaylen Brown scored 23 points, contributing to Celtics' 3-1 record on their trip.
Celtics' loss may affect their playoff positioning in the Eastern Conference.
